mapper.sql: SELECT t1.`BZSJ`, t1.`CREATEDATE`, t1.`CREATEMAN`, t1.`ENABLE`, t1.`JD`, t1.`ND`, t1.`ORMORGID`, t11.`ORGNAME` AS `ORMORGNAME`, t1.`ORMORGSECTORID`, t31.`ORGSECTORNAME` AS `ORMORGSECTORNAME`, t1.`PIMPERSONID`, t21.`PIMPERSONNAME`, t1.`PXZZF`, t31.`SHORTNAME`, t1.`TRMPLANFORMUID`, t1.`TRMPLANFORMUNAME`, t1.`UPDATEDATE`, t1.`UPDATEMAN`, t11.`ZZDZS` FROM `T_TRMPLANFORMU` t1 LEFT JOIN T_ORG t11 ON t1.ORMORGID = t11.ORGID LEFT JOIN T_PIMPERSON t21 ON t1.PIMPERSONID = t21.PIMPERSONID LEFT JOIN T_ORGSECTOR t31 ON t1.ORMORGSECTORID = t31.ORGSECTORID WHERE t1.ENABLE = 1

SELECT t1.BZSJ, t1.CREATEDATE, t1.CREATEMAN, t1.ENABLE, t1.JD, t1.ND, t1.ORMORGID, t11.ORGNAME AS ORMORGNAME, t1.ORMORGSECTORID, t31.ORGSECTORNAME AS ORMORGSECTORNAME, t1.PIMPERSONID, t21.PIMPERSONNAME, t1.PXZZF, t31.SHORTNAME, t1.TRMPLANFORMUID, t1.TRMPLANFORMUNAME, t1.UPDATEDATE, t1.UPDATEMAN, t11.ZZDZS FROM T_TRMPLANFORMU t1 LEFT JOIN T_ORG t11 ON t1.ORMORGID = t11.ORGID LEFT JOIN T_PIMPERSON t21 ON t1.PIMPERSONID = t21.PIMPERSONID LEFT JOIN T_ORGSECTOR t31 ON t1.ORMORGSECTORID = t31.ORGSECTORID WHERE t1.ENABLE = 1
